field.name: body_html
field.div:
% set colors = {'needsAction': 'grey', 'accepted': 'green', 'tentative': '#FFFF00', 'declined': 'red'} % set is_online = 'appointment_type_id' in object.event_id and object.event_id.appointment_type_id % set customer = object.event_id.find_partner_customer() % set target_responsible = object.partner_id == object.event_id.partner_id % set target_customer = object.partner_id == customer % set recurrent = object.recurrence_id and not ctx.get('calendar_template_ignore_recurrence')
Hello ${object.common_name},
% if is_online and target_customer: Your appointment ${object.event_id.appointment_type_id.name} with ${object.event_id.user_id.name} has been booked.
% elif is_online and target_responsible: % if customer ${customer.name} scheduled the following appointment ${object.event_id.appointment_type_id.name} with you. % else Your appointment ${object.event_id.appointment_type_id.name} has been booked. % endif
% elif not target_responsible: ${object.event_id.user_id.partner_id.name} invited you for the ${object.event_id.name} meeting.
% else: Your meeting ${object.event_id.name} has been booked. % endif
% if not is_online or object.state != 'accepted':
Accept
Decline % endif
${'Reschedule' if is_online and target_customer else 'View'}
${format_datetime(dt=object.event_id.start, tz=object.mail_tz if not object.event_id.allday else None, dt_format="EEEE", lang_code=object.env.lang)}
${str(object.event_id.start.day)}
${format_datetime(dt=object.event_id.start, tz=object.mail_tz if not object.event_id.allday else None, dt_format="MMMM y", lang_code=object.env.lang)}
% if not object.event_id.allday
${format_time(time=object.event_id.start, tz=object.mail_tz, time_format="short", lang_code=object.env.lang)}
% if object.mail_tz
(${object.mail_tz})
% endif %endif
Details of the event
% if is_online:
Appointment Type: ${object.event_id.appointment_type_id.name} % endif % if object.event_id.location:
Location: ${object.event_id.location} (View Map)
% endif % if recurrent:
When: ${object.recurrence_id.name} % endif % if not object.event_id.allday and object.event_id.duration
Duration: ${('%dH%02d' % (object.event_id.duration,round(object.event_id.duration*60)%60))} % endif
Attendees
% for attendee in object.event_id.attendee_ids:
% if attendee.common_name != object.common_name: ${attendee.common_name} % else: You % endif
% endfor
% if object.event_id.videocall_location:
Join Video Call: ${object.event_id.videocall_location} % endif
% if not is_html_empty(object.event_id.description):
Description of the event ${object.event_id.description | safe} % endif
Thank you, % if object.event_id.user_id.signature:
${object.event_id.user_id.signature | safe} % endif
